title: 336 Twitter Employees Sacked As New CEO Cuts Costs
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Technology - Today 
SAN FRANCISCO (AP) -- Twitter is laying off 336 employees, signaling CEO Jack Dorsey's resolve to slash costs while the company struggles to...
